tool.name: tool_13

param.name: BOUNDARY
param.dialogReference:
Boundary Layer

Grid, input

The absolute vertical distance to the boundary layer.

param.name: OBSERVED
param.dialogReference:
Observations

Grid, input

Observations used for local scaling factor calibration (e.g. precipitation, cloudiness).

param.name: B_GRID
param.dialogReference:
Calibrated Scaling Factor

Grid, output

Calibrated scaling factor used in the wind effect correction.

param.name: B_CONST
param.dialogReference:
Constant Scaling Factor

Floating point

Minimum: 0.000000

Default: 0.010000

Constant scaling factor used in the wind effect correction.

param.name: KERNEL_TYPE
param.dialogReference:
Kernel Type

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Square

[1] Circle

Default: 1

Kernel specification used to request observations for local scaling factor calibration.

param.name: KERNEL_SIZE
param.dialogReference:
Kernel Size

Integer

Minimum: 1

Default: 2

Kernel specification used to request observations for local scaling factor calibration.

tool.summary: Wind effect correction using generalized logistic functions.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
